alert.note: Alert for Saratoga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 5:49PM EDT until June 06 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Saratoga County in east central New York... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Day Center, or 14 miles northwest of Saratoga Springs, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Rock City Falls, Kings, Mount Pleasant, Greenfield, Shaw Corners, Barkersville, Glenwild, Greenfield Center, Wiley Corners, Long Corners, North Greenfield, Porter Corners, East Galway, Chatfield Corner, North Milton, West Day, Fox Hill, Lake Desolation and Frink Corner. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
